title: Dalit woman in Tamil Nadu filmed, blackmailed, raped for months by gang - The News Minute
content:
1. Dalit woman in Tamil Nadu filmed, blackmailed, raped for months by gang  The News Minute
  2. Dalit girl sexually assaulted for months by eight men in Tamil Nadu  Deccan Herald
  3. Four minors among 8 held for Dalit womanâ€™s rape in Tamil Nadu  Hindustan Times
  4. Tamil Nadu: 8, including 4 school students held for sexually assaulting woman in Virudhunagar  Times of India
  5. Eight, including two DMK members, four minors, arrested for raping Dalit woman  The Indian Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: In a crime that seems to be a repeat of the Pollachi rape case as it's infamously known, eight persons including three school students have been arrested for allegedly sexually assaulting a 22-year-old Dalit woman repeatedly over a period of seven months. According to the police, the accused threatened to leak private videos of the woman and continued to rape her over months. The complaint states that Hariharan alias Saravanan (27) befriended the woman over social media, and the two became friends.
